alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 30 at 4:47PM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Upper St. Martin, St. Mary, Lower St. Martin and Iberia Parishes. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin
